snippet: As native advertising gains prominence, publishers may find themselves competing not just with one another, but with the ad agencies that already exist....
abstract: Role and definition of sponsored content offered by publishers to advertisers has shifted as publishers and social media platforms develop closer relationships; publishers are now facing heightened expectations from advertisers, who no longer are solely reliant on publishers for distribution.
lead_paragraph: As native advertising gains prominence, publishers may find themselves competing not just with one another, but with the ad agencies that already exist.

headline.main: How Sponsored Content Is Becoming King in a Facebook World
headline.print_headline: In Media Company Advertising, Sponsored Content Is Becoming King
